name: Fusion Alpha Build v0.2
description:
This is a new Alpha build with a couple of changes and progress in development.

1. Buttons have been remapped, hence reducing number of keys pressed.

2. Some UI and background arts have been added to game. ( More coming, and existing ones will most likely change over time)

3. First platformer level has been designed a bit more with some interactions added showing the direction in which further levels might be developed.( Also subject to change)

4. Pause menu has been added in the platformer level.(Press "Esc".  This is also subject to change)

5. And all other Bug fixes.

Please Try out the game and drop your feedback in the comment section on the Gamepage. I would really appreciate this.
